name: http://gisportal.iom.int/arcgis/rest/services
description: GIS portal of the International Organization for Migration (IOM), providing ArcGIS REST services for geospatial data and services.
data_themes: Environment (as per DCAT-AP, since this is a geospatial services catalog, environment is a plausible theme; actual theme may vary by specific datasets and datasets should be mapped individually)
